Key Match Events: Bradley Barcola scored a goal in the opening minute
Federico Dimarco scored a goal in the 30th minute
Davide Frattesi scored a goal in the 51st minute
Giacomo Raspadori scored a goal in the 74th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Luciano Spalletti praised Sandro Tonali's performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Giovanni Di Lorenzo made a mistake on a back-pass leading to the opening goal
Others: France and Italy were looking for redemption after failing to impress at Euro 2024
The next round of games will see France hosting Belgium and Italy away to Israel in Budapest
